Name: Sniper Hunter Adventure 3D
About the game: Travel in an epic journey to hunt animals with your sniper rifle! With access to powerful snipers you will rely on your marksman skills to hunt animals. There are in total 48 missions to complete with 7 sniper rifles. Change sniper with ''Q'' Activate/Deactivate Night Vision with ''Right mouse click'' - Easy GUI Controls - Ultimate hunting - Night Vision - Great sniper control - 48 missions - Hunt Stag - Hunt Rabbit - Hunt Wolf - Hunt Boar - Hunt Duck - Hunt Eagle
